name: XDC Network
intro: Blockchain technology solution built by XinFin
introduce: The XDC Network is the blockchain technology solution built by XinFin. The XDC Network is a global, open-source, delegated proof of stake consensus network (XDPoS), which enables hybrid relay bridges, instant block finality and interoperability with ISO 20022 financial messaging standards. The network’s hybrid (private/public) architecture is designed to support institutional use in trade finance and asset tokenization.
